BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Prelude.ROM.asyncRom#
BlackBox.type:
asyncRom# :: KnownNat n -- ^ ARG[0]
           => Vec n a    -- ^ ARG[1]
           -> Int        -- ^ ARG[2]
           -> a

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Prelude.ROM.rom#
BlackBox.type:
rom# :: KnownNat n      -- ARG[0]
      => SClock clk      -- clk,  ARG[1]
      -> Vec n a         -- init, ARG[2]
      -> Signal' clk Int -- rd,   ARG[3]
      -> Signal' clk a
